name: aisbreaker-api
description: This package provides an interface/API/SDK to access different AI APIs (OpenAI ChatGPT/Completion, Google Bart and more) in the same way by providing a uniform interface/API inclusive SDK for NodeJS/TypeScript/JavaScript

scripts.start: date --iso-8601=seconds && npm run build && date --iso-8601=seconds && node build/start.js

author: aisbreaker
